languages.text: "Радикальное решение, продиктованное праведной нетерпимостью. Разделяет ли префект ваши взгляды — узнаем только по возвращении на Даргонус".
"A drastic decision born out of righteous indignation. Whether or not the prefect shares your views — that we won't know until we return to Dargonus."
languages.original_text: "Радикальное решение, продиктованное праведной нетерпимостью. Разделяет ли префект ваши взгляды — узнаем только по возвращении на Даргонус".

traits.locale_text: "A radical decision born out of righteous indignation. Whether the Prefect shares your views will only be known once we return to Dargonus."
"A radical decision born out of righteous indignation. Whether the Prefect shares your views will only be known once we return to Dargonus."
"A radical decision born out of righteous indignation. Whether or not the Prefect shares your views — that we won't know until we return to Dargonus."
"A radical decision born out of righteous indignation. Whether or not the Prefect shares your views — that we won't know until we return to Dargonus."
"A drastic decision born out of righteous indignation. Whether or not the prefect shares your views — that we won't know until we return to Dargonus."
"A drastic decision born out of righteous indignation. Whether or not the prefect shares your views — that we won't know until we return to Dargonus."

languages.text: "Eine drastische, aus rechtschaffener Empörung geborene Entscheidung. Ob die Präfektin Eure Ansichten teilt ... erfahren wir erst nach unserer Rückkehr nach Dargonus."
languages.original_text: "A drastic decision born out of righteous indignation. Whether or not the prefect shares your views — that we won't know until we return to Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: "Eine drastische, aus rechtschaffener Empörung geborene Entscheidung. Ob die Präfektin Eure Ansichten teilt ... erfahren wir erst nach unserer Rückkehr nach Dargonus."

languages.text: « Une décision radicale, motivée par une juste indignation. Quant à savoir si la préfète partage ou non votre opinion, nous devrons attendre d'être de retour sur Dargonus pour le découvrir. »
languages.original_text: "A drastic decision born out of righteous indignation. Whether or not the prefect shares your views — that we won't know until we return to Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: « Une décision radicale, motivée par une juste indignation. Quant à savoir si la préfète partage ou non votre opinion, nous devrons attendre d'être de retour sur Dargonus pour le découvrir. »

languages.text: “这算是出于义愤而做出来的激烈决定。至于行政官是否赞同你的观点，恐怕只有等回到达戈努斯之后才知道了。”
languages.original_text: "A drastic decision born out of righteous indignation. Whether or not the prefect shares your views — that we won't know until we return to Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: “这算是出于义愤而做出来的激烈决定。至于行政官是否赞同你的观点，恐怕只有等回到达戈努斯之后才知道了。”

languages.text: «Una decisión drástica provocada por una indignación justa. Si la prefecta comparte su opinión... no lo sabremos hasta llegar a Dargonus».
languages.original_text: "A drastic decision born out of righteous indignation. Whether or not the prefect shares your views — that we won't know until we return to Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: «Una decisión drástica provocada por una indignación justa. Si la prefecta comparte su opinión... no lo sabremos hasta llegar a Dargonus».

languages.text: 「正義の憤りから生まれた、思い切った決断です。総監があなたの意見に賛同するかどうかは、ダルゴナスに戻るまで分かりません」
languages.original_text: "A drastic decision born out of righteous indignation. Whether or not the prefect shares your views — that we won't know until we return to Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: 「正義の憤りから生まれた、思い切った決断です。総監があなたの意見に賛同するかどうかは、ダルゴナスに戻るまで分かりません」

languages.text: "Haklı bir öfkeyle alınmış sert bir karar. Prefektin sizin görüşlerinizi paylaşıp paylaşmadığını Dargonus'a dönene dek bilemeyeceğiz."
languages.original_text: "A drastic decision born out of righteous indignation. Whether or not the prefect shares your views — that we won't know until we return to Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: "Haklı bir öfkeyle alınmış sert bir karar. Prefektin sizin görüşlerinizi paylaşıp paylaşmadığını Dargonus'a dönene dek bilemeyeceğiz."
